CoderDojo_Controller: Blocks for using the CoderDojo Game Controller
CoderDojo_Controller.buttonIsPressed: Get the button state (pressed or not) for any of the 8 controller buttons. Buttons A and B are the same as on the Micro:bit
CoderDojo_Controller.buttonIsPressed|par: the button to query, eg: CoderDojoButton.Left
CoderDojo_Controller.onButtonPress: Run code when a button on the controller is pressed or released. Buttons A and B on the controller are the same as buttons A and B on the Micro:bit
CoderDojo_Controller.onButtonPress|param: the button to query, eg: CoderDojoButton.Left
run code when the button is either pressed or released, eg: CoderDojoButtonEvent.Pressed
CoderDojo_Controller.setLed: Turn a LED on the controller on or off.
CoderDojo_Controller.setLed|param|led: which LED, there is currentely only 1 controllable LED on the controller which is CoderDojoLed.Red
CoderDojo_Controller.setLed|param|state: turn the LED either on or off, eg: CoderDojoLedState.On
